00095 /**
00096  * @brief Setup the reporter to be run
00097  * @param BaseEngine& - The engine associated with this reporter
00098  * @param CNExperiment& - The experiment
00099  * @param CNProbeSetArray& - The probe set vector associated with the experiment
00100  * @param AffxArray<CNAnalysisMethod>& - The analysis methods to extract data from
00101  */
00102 void CNReporter::setup(    BaseEngine& engine,
00103                         CNExperiment& objExperiment,
00104                         CNProbeSetArray& vProbeSets,
00105                         AffxArray<CNAnalysisMethod>& vMethods)
00106 {
00107   m_pEngine = &engine;
00108   m_pobjExperiment = &objExperiment;
00109   m_pvProbeSets = &vProbeSets;
00110   m_pvMethods = &vMethods;
00111 }

00113 /**
00114  * @brief Is the reporter setup to be rrun
00115  */
00116 void CNReporter::isSetup()
00117 {
00118   if ((m_pEngine == NULL) || (m_pobjExperiment == NULL) || (m_pvProbeSets == NULL)) {
00119     Err::errAbort("CNReport is not setup properly.");
00120   }
00121 }

00124 void CNReporter::loadParam(const AffxString& strName, PgOpt::PgOptType type, const AffxString& strValue, affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType& param)
00125 {
00126   param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strName));
00127   switch (type) {
00128   case PgOpt::BOOL_OPT: param.SetValueInt8(((strValue == "true") ? (char)1 : (char)0)); break;
00129   case PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT: param.SetValueFloat((float)::getDouble(strValue)); break;
00130   case PgOpt::INT_OPT: param.SetValueInt32(::getInt(strValue)); break;
00131   case PgOpt::STRING_OPT:
00132     if ((strName.indexOf("command-line") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("analysis") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("program-cvs-id") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("version-to-report") != -1) || (strName.endsWith("-dir"))) {
00133       param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strValue));
00134     } else {
00135       param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(strValue)));
00136     }
00137     break;
00138   default: throw(Except("Cannot find PgOpt type for: " + strName));
00139   }
00140 }

00142 void CNReporter::loadBuffer(char* pBuffer, int& iIndex, AffxString& str, int iLength)
00143 {
00144   if (iLength == -1) {
00145     iLength = str.length();
00146   }
00147   unsigned int ui = htonl(iLength);
00148   memcpy((void*)(pBuffer + iIndex), (void*)&ui, sizeof(unsigned int));
00149   iIndex += sizeof(unsigned int);
00150   memcpy((void*)(pBuffer + iIndex), str.c_str(), iLength); iIndex += iLength;
00151 }
00152 
00153 void CNReporter::loadBuffer(char* pBuffer, int& iIndex, unsigned char uc)
00154 {
00155   memcpy((void*)(pBuffer + iIndex), (void*)&uc, sizeof(unsigned char)); iIndex += sizeof(unsigned char);
00156 }

00159 {
00160   memcpy((void*)(pBuffer + iIndex), (void*)&c, sizeof(char)); iIndex += sizeof(char);
00161 }

00163 void CNReporter::loadBuffer(char* pBuffer, int& iIndex, unsigned int ui)
00164 {
00165   ui = htonl(ui); memcpy((void*)(pBuffer + iIndex), (void*)&ui, sizeof(unsigned int)); iIndex += sizeof(unsigned int);
00166 }
00167 
00168 void CNReporter::loadBuffer(char* pBuffer, int& iIndex, float f)
00169 {
00170   type_punned pun;
00171   pun.v_float = f;
00172   loadBuffer(pBuffer, iIndex, (unsigned int)pun.v_int32);
00173 }

00175 AffxString CNReporter::prepareAscii(const AffxString& str, int iLength)
00176 {
00177   AffxString strPrepared = str;
00178   int iActualLength = (int)strPrepared.length();
00179   strPrepared.padBlanks(iLength);
00180   strPrepared.setAt(iActualLength, 0);
00181   return strPrepared;
00182 }

00184 /**
00185  * @brief Return the array name
00186  * @return AffxString - The array name
00187  */
00188 AffxString CNReporter::getArrayName()
00189 {
00190   AffxString strArrayName;
00191   if (m_pEngine->getOpt("array-name") == "") {
00192     if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cdf-file")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("cdf-file") != "")) {
00193       strArrayName = Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("cdf-file"));
00194       int iFindIndex = strArrayName.indexOf(".");
00195       if (iFindIndex != -1) {
00196         strArrayName = strArrayName.substring(0, iFindIndex);
00197       }
00198     } else if ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("spf-file")) && (m_pEngine->getOpt("spf-file") != "")) {
00199       strArrayName = Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("spf-file"));
00200       int iFindIndex = strArrayName.indexOf(".");
00201       if (iFindIndex != -1) {
00202         strArrayName = strArrayName.substring(0, iFindIndex);
00203       }
00204     } else {
00205       if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("annotation-file")) {
00206         strArrayName =  Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("annotation-file"));
00207         int iFindIndex = strArrayName.indexOf(".");
00208         if (iFindIndex != -1) {
00209           strArrayName = strArrayName.substring(0, iFindIndex);
00210         }
00211       }
00212     }
00213   } else {
00214     strArrayName = m_pEngine->getOpt("array-name");
00215   }
00216   return strArrayName;
00217 }
00218 
00219 void CNReporter::wavinessSegCounts(int& segCountLoss, int& segCountGain, float& sd)
00220 {
00221   int wavinessBlockSize = m_pEngine->getOptInt("waviness-block-size");
00222   int wavinessGenSpan   = m_pEngine->getOptInt("waviness-genomic-span");
00223 
00224   segCountLoss = 0;
00225   segCountGain = 0;
00226 
00227   bool segmentTypeMethodSeen = false;
00228   int iIndex;
00229   int iSegmentType = CNSegment::getSegmentType("cn-segment");
00230   int xChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00231   int yChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00232   const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00233 
00234   for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size(); iIndex++) {
00235     CNAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00236     if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis() && pMethod->getSegmentCount(iSegmentType) > 0) {
00237       segmentTypeMethodSeen = true;
00238       for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; iSegmentIndex < pMethod->getSegments().getCount(); iSegmentIndex++) {
00239         CNSegment* p = pMethod->getSegments().getAt(iSegmentIndex);
00240 
00241         // only autosome segments of genomic span greater than wavinessGenSpan
00242         // and containing more than wavinessBlockSize markers
00243         if (p->getChromosome() != xChromosome &&
00244             p->getChromosome() != yChromosome &&
00245             p->getEndPosition() - p->getStartPosition() > wavinessGenSpan  &&
00246             p->getMarkerCount() > wavinessBlockSize) {
00247           int state = p->getCall();
00248           if (state < 2)
00249             segCountLoss++;
00250           else if (state > 2)
00251             segCountGain++;
00252         }
00253       }
00254     }
00255   }
00256   if (!segmentTypeMethodSeen) {
00257     segCountLoss = -1;
00258     segCountGain = -1;
00259   }
00260   int probeSetSize = (int)getProbeSets()->size();
00261   AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> log2Ratios(probeSetSize);
00262   AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> log2RatioDiffs(probeSetSize);
00263 
00264   CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSetPrev = NULL;
00265   int log2RatioDiffsLen = 0;
00266   int iLog2RatioIndex = 0;
00267   for (iIndex = 0; iIndex < probeSetSize; iIndex++) {
00268     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00269         if (isCytoScanHD && (!pobjProbeSet->processAsCN())) {continue;}
00270     if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == xChromosome || pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == yChromosome)
00271       break;
00272 
00273     float log2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00274     log2Ratios.set(iLog2RatioIndex, log2Ratio);
00275     if (iLog2RatioIndex % 2 == 1) {
00276       log2RatioDiffs.set(log2RatioDiffsLen, log2Ratio - pobjProbeSetPrev->getLog2Ratio());
00277       log2RatioDiffsLen++;
00278     }
00279     pobjProbeSetPrev = pobjProbeSet;
00280         iLog2RatioIndex++;
00281   }
00282   double dv = log2Ratios.var(iLog2RatioIndex) - log2RatioDiffs.var(log2RatioDiffsLen) / 2.0;
00283   sd = 0.0;
00284   if (dv > 0)
00285     sd = sqrt(dv);
00286 
00287   // file away for Report.txt
00288   CNExperiment* pObjExperiment = getExperiment();
00289   pObjExperiment->setWavinessSegCountLoss(segCountLoss);
00290   pObjExperiment->setWavinessSegCountGain(segCountGain);
00291   pObjExperiment->setWavinessSd(sd);
00292 }
00293 
00294 std::string CNReporter::wavinessAmplitudes()
00295 {
00296   CNExperiment::wavAmplitudes_t wavAmpl = getExperiment()->getWavinessAmplitudes();
00297   std::sort(wavAmpl.begin(), wavAmpl.end(), wavSortCriterion());
00298   std::string retStr;
00299   for (int i = 0; i < wavAmpl.size(); i++) {
00300     retStr += ToStr(wavAmpl[i].second);
00301     retStr += ",";
00302   }
00303   if (!retStr.empty())
00304     retStr.resize(retStr.size() - 1);
00305 
00306   return retStr;
00307 }
